hackathon-eligibility: Participants must be registered on Peatix
hackathon-requirements: Provide a summary of the hack with image or video, and text explaining the inspiration
hackathon-rules:
1 Seaboard Block and 1 Lightpad Block
for each member of the winning team
1 Developer Kit for each member
ROLI
Google
JUCE JAPAN
Playwright, stage acoustician, robotic engineer
Music producer, EnterTech evangelist

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Developer kit (one Lightpad Block and one Developer Control Block)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=6 Chome-11-1 Roppongi, Minato, Tokyo 106-6108, Japan

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Rewards the most creative use of BLOCKS for musical experience.
